section2.title: The most trusted Portfolio Manager
section2.abstract: Gone are the days of managing your crypto assets with multiple wallets across multiple exchanges. Now with Goosebumps, you can manage all your crypto assets in one place.
section2.subtitle1: Track your portfolio's performance with ease
section2.description1: We automatically calculate how much you've earned from every trade in the last 24 hours. With our beautiful charts and live price updates, you can always stay informed about your portfolio's performance. Never miss an opportunity again!
section2.subtitle2: Simplify how you buy and sell
section2.description2: With just a few taps on the screen, you can easily buy or sell your favorite cryptocurrencies for another cryptocurrency or fiat currency. Our simple-to-use UI makes it easy to get in and out of the market in no time at all!

section6.title: Charting your success
section6.abstract: Portfolio Tracker is a simple yet powerful portfolio tracker created by professional traders and engineers. We use the latest technologies to make sure you’re always on the top of our game.
section6.description1: View a detailed trade history of your trades, including the price at the time, the date it was made, and the total profit or loss.
section6.description2: Don’t get lost and keep track of your trading activity, anytime, anywhere.
section6.description3: Don’t get lost and keep track of your trading activity, anytime, anywhere.
